title: coupable
author: coupable
content: I am looking for $30 in btc and i will send $32 in usdt using binance internal transfer.Please check btc rate in preev and send $30 equivalent to: bc1q02tf2cd2rdn2hsaxmz02xd5rtl9w3jyvsd0jm9Then pm me the transaction hash with your usdt tron trc20 address (no problem if it's not a binance address) or just post here if you don't mind posting your address in public.I am in urgent need for this amount in BTC and the withdrawal fees in binance is so high in btc. I consider this as a kind act from you and a real exchange deal. I would consider tips for this address.Thank You

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Sent, will send a PM with the info in a bit.Edit: PM sent.

comments.author: CCMS
comments.body: If this is not over yet, please let me know .

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: Quote from: CCMS on October 07, 2023, 06:31:25 AMIf this is not over yet, please let me know .Thank You. I already get a deal with alterra in PMs. I will close this topic for now.
